title: Design a Stack With Increment Operation
content:
Design a stack which supports the following operations.
Implement the  class:

 Initializes the object with  which is the maximum number of elements in the stack or do nothing if the stack reached the .
 Adds  to the top of the stack if the stack hasn't reached the .
 Pops and returns the top of stack or -1 if the stack is empty.
 Increments the bottom  elements of the stack by . If there are less than  elements in the stack, just increment all the elements in the stack.

 


 






At most 1000 calls will be made to each method of ,  and  each separately.
